items.content_html: El-beeswarm is a JavaScript library designed to easily create beeswarm plots. These charts are ideal for visualizing data distributions and relationships between variables. This library is lightweight, easy to use and highly customizable.

items.content_html: Astral.js is a lightweight UI toolkit designed to empower JavaScript developers with powerful tools for building modern user interfaces. With Astral.js, you gain access to a comprehensive set of features including context and state management, event-driven architecture, and sophisticated JavaScript-powered media queries.

With Astral.js, you gain access to a comprehensive set of features including context and state management, event-driven architecture, and sophisticated JavaScript-powered media queries.
